Title: Understanding the Core Logic of Xiaohongshu Viral Content
Content: To create viral content on Xiaohongshu, it's essential to understand the core logic behind it. The first principle is to avoid self-indulgence and adopt a user-centric mindset. Many creators mistakenly believe that their personal preferences will resonate with the audience, but this is often not the case. Instead, it's crucial to respect data and user feedback. For instance, one of our successful students, Fang Haohao, initially struggled with content that didn't align with her audience's interests. By analyzing successful posts and understanding what users value, she was able to adjust her strategy and create content that provided real value to her audience. This approach involves studying viral content, breaking it down, and identifying common elements that resonate with users. By focusing on user needs and preferences, creators can produce content that is more likely to go viral. This method is not about copying but about understanding the underlying principles that make content successful and applying them to your unique context.

Title: Key Metrics for Xiaohongshu Success
Content: Success on Xiaohongshu is driven by several key metrics, including keywords, interaction rates, and completion rates. Keywords are crucial because Xiaohongshu's algorithm relies heavily on them to recommend content. Using relevant and popular keywords can significantly increase the visibility of your posts. Interaction rates, which include likes, comments, and shares, are another critical metric. High interaction rates signal to the algorithm that your content is engaging and valuable, leading to more recommendations. Completion rates, or the percentage of users who watch your content to the end, also play a significant role. Content that retains viewers is more likely to be promoted. To optimize these metrics, creators should focus on producing high-quality, engaging content that encourages interaction and retains viewers. Additionally, understanding the platform's review process, which includes safety, quality, and originality checks, can help ensure your content meets the necessary standards. By focusing on these key metrics, creators can improve their chances of success on Xiaohongshu.

Title: Building a Strong Xiaohongshu Account
Content: Building a strong Xiaohongshu account involves understanding and leveraging the platform's account hierarchy and features. Xiaohongshu categorizes accounts into different levels, such as 'Gold Carrot' and 'Professional Account,' based on activity and engagement. Higher-level accounts receive more visibility and recommendations. To achieve a higher account level, creators should consistently post high-quality content and engage with their audience. Additionally, applying for a 'Professional Account' can provide additional benefits, such as access to more features and tools. This process involves verifying your identity and selecting a suitable category for your content. Once approved, maintaining a high level of activity and engagement is crucial. This includes regularly posting content, interacting with followers, and participating in platform activities. By strategically building and maintaining a strong account, creators can increase their visibility and reach on Xiaohongshu, ultimately driving more engagement and growth.
